description: A cosy, elegant Stube-style restaurant where the staff wear typical Aosta Valley costume and the menu features dishes with a particular focus on cheese (including an excellent fondue!) alongside traditional regional fare. Typical decor with refined, personalised furnishings and a profusion of wood.
